answers.answer: My mother had it with my brother. Once you get he hang of it it will be easier. Good luck.

I've had it twice. Both times I maintained it with diet & it was fine. I actually felt so much healthier & my body really loved the diet. My energy increased & I lost a little weight (not overweight to begin with), I felt great!!

I had it with my son and I don't know about this pregnancy yet...I too was able to control it with diet alone...i wasn't over weight but diabetes itself runs in my family which is def not something I hope I get...its not that complicated like I thought it would be and like stated above it becomes easier and easier the more you deal with it

I have it. Its hard at first bc you are stressed about eating the right things but like they said once u do it,  it becomes easier. And it actually turned out to be a great diet. Alot of ppl I know say oh im pregnant and can eat what I want and gain a ton of weight. I have gained 5lbs and baby is about 7 so I lost weight.

I have diabeties passed down u learn reali quickly what is good nd whats nt. If its kept under control u will b fine i am on insulin every meal nd b4 bed as mine has a mind of its own nd my pancreus has a mind of its own. just keep on top of it all nd u will b fine im sure of it

question: Im 24...not over weight...a 1st time mummy.. and I still gestational diabetes!!!!  How many mummy's out there have it a well? Is it hard to keep a handle on? Iv only just found out and trying to maintain it through diet. It's harder than I thought. Just hope my baby is ok :)
title: Any1 else have Gestational Diabetes?
